Text:
wow!....
this film makes me happy I was born in the 70s.
these criminals are "fucked in the head"
(my personal diagnoses) .....BUT!!!!!
no living creature deserves to be treated so poorly!!
(some deserve death,some deserve rehab)
NONE deserve torment!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

maybe Hitler was right about ONE thing ONLY!!! euthanasia is good for some people
(some of the guards perhaps??)
